body: A gravewalker may take direct control of one of her undead minions within her aura of desecration, as if using magic jar; the witch's poppet acts as the soul receptacle for this ability. The minion gets no saving throw against this ability. This replaces the witch's hex gained at 8th level.
name: Possess Undead
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Witch/Witch Archetypes/Gravewalker/Possess Undead
